title: Single-atom Co dispersed on polyoxometalate derivatives confined in bamboo-like carbon nanotubes enabling efficient dual-site lattice oxygen mediated oxygen evolution electrocatalysis for acidic water electrolyzers
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, 17,3088-3098
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE00173G, Paper
Jianyun Liu, Tanyuan Wang, Zijie Lin, Mengyi Liao, Shuxia Liu, Shiyu Wang, Zhao Cai, Hao Sun, Yue Shen, Yunhui Huang, Qing Li
In situ generated confined single-atom Co3+ sites with a low coordination number and abundant oxygen vacancies demonstrate enhanced stability and activity for acidic oxygen evolution with broken scaling relations.
